features: 🥘8 Power and Temperature Levels- The portable induction cooktop owns 8 power levels from 300 W to 1800 W, you could adjust the power for cooking soups, beans, sauces, spaghetti, etc. In the meantime, With adjustable temperature (from 140℉ to 464℉), you could use for roasting steak, bacon,scrambled eggs,grill etc. The induction burner is more efficient and boil water faster than traditional gas, making cooking much faster and easier!

🥘Ultra Thin Design- With a thickness of only 1.65 inches. The design not only makes this induction cooktop very eye-catching in your kitchen but also easy to carry than electric stove. Whether you are going on a trip or cooking at your kitchen or backyard, this AMZCHEF electric cooktop burners will be the good choice. And it is also convenient to store in your cupboard.

🥘Easy To Clean- The Non-Stick working surface is designed with black polished crystal glass, shinny and durable. simply wipe with a damp towel. The sensor touch button is sensitive and durable compared to push button. The LED display of electric cooktop clearly shows the setting for you.

🥘Safe To Use- A temperature sensor equipped can monitor the temperature inside the high power hot plate.When an excessive temperature is monitored, the single induction cooktop will stop automatically for self-protection. 3-hour automatic timer provides high-precision operation, eliminating the need to wait on your food to be ready. Child lock and rounded edges for ultimate safety.

🥘Compatitable Magnetic Cookware- The induction hot plate works with magnetic induction cookware like cast iron, iron, steel, and enameled iron cookware (diameter is between 12cm to 26 cm). The auto-pan detection will shut the unit off automatically after 60 seconds if no cookware, or the incorrect cookware is detected.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy a happy life with the Amzchef Induction Cooktop! Thanks to the electromagnetic induction technology, everyone should be able to enjoy the rapid boils and steady simmers that induction cooking provides.Having this induction cooker around, you could prepare fantastic food in a short time for your beloved ones.

8 power level You could quickly choose your desired power from 300W to 1800W. This induction cooker totally meet your various cooking needs: simmer, deep fry, boil, sauté, sear, steam, roast with ease. 8 Temperature Levels Adjustable temperature ranging from 140℉ to 464℉. Select the right temperature for your cooking. Sensitive large touch buttons for enhanced usability.

AMZCHEF 1800W induction cooktop offers your fast heating and convenience life Ultra Thin Body Compact body for easy handling and storage, portable induction cooktop perfect for RV, dorm, home kitchen, boats, or wherever you need a cooking zone Safe To Use A child safety lock is for the ultimate in reliability when in use. Meanwhile, overheating protection also plays a protective role. Long 3-Hour Timer Press “+” or “-” button to set the timer in 1-minute increments (long press for 10 minutes) and ranges from 0 to 180 minutes. Easy To Clean The black polished crystal premium glass surface is easy to clean, just wipe it down with a microfiber cleaning cloth and it looks brand new again.
How to Find a Compatible Cookware?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the hot pot
reviews.reviewText: I purchased it majorly for the hot pot purpose, and it works great.Pros: It's large enough to hold my daily-use stainless steel pot which is good for 4-6 person. It's pretty silent and heat quickly. The top is easy to clean which is a plus.Cons: currently I couldn't find a con after several uses. Probably the price is not inexpensive, but i want to choose a reliable cooktop. It's light-weight but feels high quality materials. I will definitely update if there would be any problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WHAT'S NOT TO LOVE
reviews.reviewText: I decided to get this induction unit to replace my old hot plate. This has been absolutely wonderful. Yes there is a learning curve to its proper use, but not a problem . What I love is that it only gets hot where a pan is sitting. I can use a large frying pan for stir fry or two pans for steaming vegetables. Clean up is a breeze with its particular surface compared to the hot plate I had before which looked horrible after a few months and was impossible to actually look clean. This unit also cools down almost immediately after turning off and looks very nice sitting on my counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just not for super heavy use
reviews.reviewText: At first it did great. Cooked well. Heated up pretty quickly. Easy to control the temperature of the pan in order to cook the food properly. Out of the blue decided it wasn't going to work anymore. I contacted the seller asking about the warranty. I got an email wanting a video so they could see what it was doing. I know they're supposed to be power on the wall. Check that it's there. I tried turning it off unplugging I looking for a reset button. Everything - it is dead. Nothing happens when you plug it in and push the button.After a little time the seller made it right.They sent me a replacement. It works well.I have decided that I will not use this as the primary hot plate waiting for the cook-top (LP gas) to be installed. That date keeps getting pushed back.I will then be moving this out to the RV as a good secondary in place of the gas stove if our LP is running low.I did notice THAT I PAID $96.00 initially and now its down to $55?Doesn't seem fair to me.It is a good hotplate. Better be steel tho.Induction does work on this.I would buy it again at the new price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cooks fast, like they say! Easy clean upDelivered in a box and packed well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Temp is good.. making tea or boiling water is like a 5 minute job.. very light weight and less buttons makes it very easy to use.. noise is almost negligible and size is good enough for 5qt pot also.. works well..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It just stopped working.
reviews.reviewText: We bought this in August 2023 and used it to boil our kettle mainly. We cooked smaller quick things like sauces on it as well but most to boil water. Worked pretty well and then one day it just "popped" and is now not working. I would get an extended warranty for this item if you choose it. Will be buying something better built/designed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm glad I bought this.
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for a way to cook some top ramen in hotels as my family and I drove from Massachusetts to Iowa to move back home permanently. Sadly the moving to Iowa box was one of the first boxes the movers grabbed to be hauled in the gigantic moving truck. No boba/ramen/coffee to be had.I did tear into this once we arrived in our brand new house. My husband chose a quaint home that has our dining room, kitchen, and a half bath on the main floor. The beautiful galley style kitchen with brand new everything is, charming.The main floor is dedicated to our 24x20ft dining room, this is where we spend most of our time anyway. However a 6x4 kitchen I was not expecting. So this burner has a permanent home on the end of my breakfast bar. Instant boil was why I bought it, but extra cooking area is what it's main use has become.Needless to say, not one meal will be forgotten to be cooked, because I did not have enough space to cook in.PROS:-I really like that you can lock it to the controls so nobody accidentally turns it on while cleaning it or by setting things on it.-It is very sensitive and responsive.-That very safety feature is a great idea that made this machine go from wanted, to nearly daily used.CONS:-If you do not set the control lock feature any person or animal can turn it on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a portable cooktop. My roommate bought one that’s a double cooktop. I decided to get this single one. It’s great for the hot pot season that’s coming up. The sleek and compact design of this cooktop not only saves counter space but also looks incredibly stylish. It’s perfect for small kitchens. Powerful performance 1800W of power, this cooktop heats up incredibly fast and cooks food nicely. The 3-hour timer feature is a lifesaver for me. I can set it and forget it, and it turns off automatically when the cooking time is up, especially when I want to steam my fish. This is also perfect for camping. Five stars well deserved!

I bought it to replace my 10 years old induction cooktop. Comparing to the old one, it's much thinner, and it has larger surface area. Which allows me to put bigger cookware. It heats up much faster than traditional cooktop. Everything works perfectly for me.
Muy útil ,calienta muy rápido y uso muy intuitivo con un tamaño fácil de guardar solo por ponerle una pega el ruidoso del ventilador cuando está en funcionamiento

The media could not be loaded. Ich habe die Platte nun schon einige Zeit im Gebrauch und bin nach wie vor begeistert. 1 L Wasser kocht unterhalb kurzen Minuten. und auch im allgemeinen Kochbetrieb heizt die Platte schnell auf.Der Wechsel zwischen den Leistungsstufen und/oder den voreingestellten Programmen geht ohne Problem. Die Leistungsstufen reichen aus, um zügig zu kochen, braten, dünsten oder schmoren.Ein weiterer, angenehmer Nebeneffekt ist, dass beim Ändern der Leistung/Programme/Zeit kein zusätzlicher Piepton nervt.Die Zeiteinstellung ist minutengenau und auch während des Kochvorgangs einstell- und änderbar.Der Lüfter schaltet sich zeitverzögert ein und hat eine erträgliche Lautstärke, zumal die Koch/Bratgeräusche ihr Übriges dazu tun.Die Reinigung geht schnell und einfach, durch die ebene Glaskeramikfläche bleibt nichts in Ecken oder Übergängen hängen, nur mit einem feuchten Spülilappen abreiben und trockenwischen.Die Sensortasten reagieren schnell und sicher auf Berührungen.Alles in Allem bin ich mit der Platte sehr zufrieden und kann sie uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen.

E secondo pezzo che ordino e non sarà ultimo perché tutti lo vogliono . Risolto problema di odore di fritto in casa . Si cucina in terrazza. La piastra e bella e facile da usare . La ho messa in prova in tutti modi ed ha risposto benissimo anche a cottura con timer

Diese platt funktioniert wirklich super. Man kann schnell kochen und gibt verschiedene Temperatur zuauswählen. Die Platte ist gut und solide verarbeitet und wirkt auch hochwertig. Von der Induktionskraft ist diese auch ganz vorne dabei. Die Qualität ist auch gut. Ich empfehle mich es weiter.
